name: io.github.pyjudge/pdf4vllm-mcp
description: PDF MCP for vLLM - Block-based PDF extraction optimized for vLLM. Extracts text, table, and image blocks from PDFs with intelligent ordering.

tools.name: list_pdfs
tools.description: List all PDF files in specified directory

tools.name: read_pdf
tools.description: Extract text, table, and image blocks from PDF with intelligent ordering
